name: Tank Elevated
description:
Have you ever tried to fly a tank and battle? Trust me it is a tough job.

In Tank Elevated you are a war-tank in a 2D world of platforms which can jump up with thruster. You are in a war zone and your mission is to eliminate all other enemy tanks while dodging their missiles. You can aim and fire missiles at will at the enemies.

Tank Elevated is a blend of classic platformer and artillery genre.
You move with A / D (or the Left / Right arrow keys) and jump with the Space Bar key. You can aim your turret with the mouse and shoot missiles with Mouse Left button. When you get power-up missile/s you can use Mouse Right button to shoot those.
